name: Dungeon Crawl (motuDev)
description:
You are a young and brave hero, who is on his way to conquer the mighty 64x64 dungeon. But suddenly, there is a trap door and you fall deep into the dungeon. You now have to escape by travelling through all the levels back up to the entrance.

You now have to choose, are you trying to run, fight or even befriend the Monsters in the dungeon.  Pick your battles wisely.

Controls:
Use your mouse and the UI as controls

Map Legend:

You can only watch the map in the beginning of each level, so be sure to remember your path ;).

Start Tile: This is where you are.

End Tile: The Stairs to the next lvl.

Trap Tile:  A Trap, try to avoid these

Treasure Tile: Here you can find Treasure

FoodTile: Find some food to heal you right here.

RandomTile: A Random Monster Encounter

A two etched sword. Be Aware of Skeletons early on.

Rules & Hints:

StrengthPotion:  Increases your base Damage

Speed Potion: Makes you attack faster

Health Potion:   Heals you

Buttons:

Fight: Your Fight with the monster will be calculated.

WARNING: After choosing you can not go back.

Run: You try to run from the monster.(Chance: 40%

Befriend:  You try to befriend the monster once.(Chance: 20%)

You can only have one monster as a friend at any time.

Collect: You collect treasure.

Discard: You Discard the Treasure.(Good for treasure that is weak).

Treasure Tiers:

  1.  Tier: Wood - brown color, not very remarkable.
  2.  Tier: Metal- gray color, recognizable.
  3.  Tier: Mythril-bright blue color.

Have Fun Playing, lets see how many stages you can beat.

This Game was made for LowRezJam.

This Game is in Development, there are still some minor Bugs to fix and lot of polish to apply. Sorry for not making a menu.
